title: sItA lakSmaNa samEta
sahitya:
sItA lakSmaNa samEta shrI kOdaNDarAma svAmi nanu brOvavEmi 


anupallavi

  prItitOnu rAmacandrapuramu veDali vAlAjAnagaramunaku vencisi
rAtnAti jEsina susyAtAbhduta carita susmita vadama lOka pAlanA
nIticE venkaTaramaNa bhAgavatulu tama sutulu jEri cEyu bhaktiki mecci
khyAtiga sakala vudhulu santasillanAyurAryOgyAStaishvaryamulaniccibrOcina
				(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
Adi kAraNUDa nIvE satyabhAmA rukmiNI samEtuDaina krSNamUrti nIvE
parabrahmamu nIvE kausalyA sutuDu nIvE suguNa jaladhE entani koniyADudurA


caraNam 1    padmanAbha parAtpara jagadEka vIra tribhuvana mOhanAkAra shAntAdhAra
padma nayana khaga vAhana lOka rakSaNa patita pAvana sanAtana 
padmajA ramaNa pArvatIvara vidhinuta suguNa bhUSaNa kalikaluSaharaNa nipuNa
padmajitavarA bhayakara shankha cakra gadAdhara sAkEtapuravara shrI raghuvara
    caraNam 2    yaluTIviga tahasildAr lakSmaNa nAyakuDArokkapeTla sETlu vartakulu veNTarAga
vilasita kIrti gAnakaLAsphUrti nAradAmshajAta tyAgarAja mUrti sahituDavai
valasina haridAsulu sEyu nAma kIrtanamula nAgasvaramula sunAdamulu vinucu
sOlapunanoyyAramuga vIdhulavaccucu bhAgavatula nUtana grhamuna karudeccina
    caraNam 3    sakala janulu nIdu hAvabhAva vilAsamulanu jUci sokki soli vismayulaiyuNDa
prakaTita guNashAli kampilI munisAmi guLOpvAlpeDla gaTTinci viccANAl
sukhavulu mecca varapinci rAma nIvu rAma nIvu koluvamara jEmanti sumamaNTapamu raciyimpa
akaLanka carita kani mecci mOdinci nUtana grha maNTapamuna sukhAsInuDaina
    caraNam 4    vudhuluyanna santarpaNa dakSiNa tAmbUla gandha puSpADulacE trpulai
sudhalOluku paluku cEnAshIrvadimpa para janulu santasmpa mEnu pulakarimpa
budhavaryuDu sadAshivuDagu nEnu harSinci nI vibhavamulanu grtirUpamuga
vidhinuta lalitamuganOnarinci bhaktinivADa nI shiramunuNDu sumamu paDa nE jUDa
